description: This file defines a React component called NotesVideo that renders a video with slides and a title bar, based on provided notes and theme data. It also includes schema validation for props using zod.

methods.name: NotesVideo
methods.description: Main React component that generates a video sequence with slides based on notes and theme.

methods.name: TitleBar
methods.description: Subcomponent rendering the title bar with animated opacity.

methods.name: Slide
methods.description: Subcomponent rendering individual slides for each note.

methods.name: EmptySlide
methods.description: Subcomponent rendering a placeholder when there are no notes.

search-terms: React FC with notes and theme
